text: Mahanadi Shankar is an Indian stage and film actor, who has appeared in Tamil language films as supporting actor and negative roles. He has appeared in films including Mahanadi (1994), Baashha (1995), Ratchagan (1997), Amarkalam (1999) and Dheena (2001). The success of the former film, meant that he used the title as a prefix to his stagename.http://www.behindwoods.com/tamil- movies-slide-shows/movie-4/kollywood-unknown/hindi-
